name: EUROPE'S BEST SHORTHAUL BUSINESS CLASS? Turkish Airlines Airbus A330-300 Review
description:
I flew Business Class on Turkish Airlines' wonderful Airbus A330-300 service from London to Istanbul, and sampled the Singapore Airlines SilverKris Loungenat London Heathrow.
